main.name: Gaurav Dasgupta
main.description: A software developer, Blogger, Youtuber and Cyclist by passion. I am a nature lover with a very keen interest in music. I love sharing my knowledge and thus have my Youtube channel. I am also a contributor in platforms like inDepth.dev, Node-RED and few others. I write technical articles on medium.com
main.bio: Dynamic, self motivated and empathetic person. I love working on frontend and also like to indulge myself into the complete product architecture whether its backend microservices or the cloud cluster technologies like docker, kubernetes and AWS. I am very much intrested in machine learning and have started learning Keras, Pandas and basic data cleaning operations using Python and Javascript as the language. Other than this I believe in sharing one's knowledge with others in the community, so I have my own youtube channel and also I am a technical reviewer for indepthd.dev and contributor to various open source technologies.

resume.skillmessage: Total 10 years of working experience in software development. Had started as a Java Developer and gradually picked up Javascript in the form of Ajax and DHTMLX, this liking gradually introduced me to bootstrap and then to Angular. Since then I have been working on all sorts of frameworks like Angular, React and Ember. I have a very keen interest in architecture and microservices which keeps me a bit handy with Java, Springboot, Containerization technologies and tools like Docker, Kubernetes and AWS. From the last 1 year along with frontend I am also playing a bit with Node-RED. Machine Learning is something where I am true learner and I need to start working out on small projects and kaggle notebooks.

education.description: I was working as a software engineer with Wipro Technologies and was having my M.Tech education being done at the same time and same place. It was WORK INTEGRATED CLASSROOM PROGRAMME

education.school: National P.G. College, Univ of Lucknow
education.description: It was a professionally inclined degree course of 3 years and I worked with Government of Uttar Pradesh as part of my final year project submission. I developed the Birth and Death Registration system using C Sharp and ASP.NET

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Product based organisation, censhare is the core platform/software focused on Content Management, Digital Asset Management and Product Info Management

work.title: Technical Lead
work.description: It was product development focussed on cost estimations and forecasts for food chain market like Mac Donald's, KFC, etc.

work.title: Senior Consultant
work.description: I was doing major frontend development using Angular and Springboot on backend for the USA based railways company BNSF

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Worked with 2 major manufacturing and Telecom companies, Lexmark and Vodafone-UK for frontend and backendd development

projects.title: My Medium Blogs
projects.category: Technical and semi technical articles on medium written by myself and purely my thoughts

projects.title: Fullstack Dev Logs
projects.category: My youtube channel where I share my learnings for all

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
